title: Anthem Earnings, Revenue beat in Q3
text:
© Reuters. Anthem Earnings, Revenue beat in Q3

Investing.com - Anthem (NYSE: ) reported third quarter that beat analysts' expectations on Wednesday and revenue that topped forecasts.

The firm reported earnings per share of $4.87 on revenue of $26.67B. Analysts polled by Investing.com anticipated EPS of $4.82 on revenue of $25.91B. That compared to EPS of $3.81 on revenue of $22.98B in the same period a year earlier. The company had reported EPS of $4.64 on revenue of $25.18B in the previous quarter.

For the year, Anthem shares are down 0.91%, under-performing the which is up 20.95% year to date.

Anthem follows other major Financial sector earnings this month

On Tuesday, October 15, 2019, JPMorgan reported third quarter EPS of $2.68 on revenue of $30.06B, compared to forecasts of EPS of $2.45 on revenue of $28.47B.

Bank of America earnings beat analyst's expectations on Wednesday, October 16, 2019, with third quarter EPS of $0.56 on revenue of $22.8B. Investing.com analysts expected EPS of $0.54 on revenue of $22.58B

Stay up-to-date on all of the upcoming earnings reports by visiting Investing.com's earnings calendar
description: Anthem Earnings, Revenue beat in Q3
